text: Ara yadi tomara bhaya kara ye, etima meyedera haka yathathabhabe purana karate parabe na, tabe sesaba meyedera madhye theke yadera bhala lage tadera biye kare na'o du'i, tina, kimba carati paryanta. Ara yadi erupa asanka kara ye, tadera madhye n'yaya sangata acarana bajaya rakhate parabe na, tabe, ekati'i athaba tomadera adhikarabhukta dasiderake; ete'i paksapatitbe jarita na ha'oyara adhikatara sambhabana.
